name: Atwood Motor Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Warrnambool. I stayed here last night with my boyfriend and found everything about the stay great. Firstly the location is excellent, was very easy to find and it is a short walk to the town, a map is provided on check in along with recommendations for places to eat. We booked the deluxe spa room, the room was a good size and extremely clean,the bath was a jacuzzi spa and very big. The price for the night was very very fair and included a choice of a continental or cooked breakfast, we both opted for the cooked breakfast which was delivered to the room and was very nice. The hotel is family run and a great service is provided. If we ever find ourselves in Warrnambool again we will definitely be staying here and also recommending it to our friends.
reviews.title: Brilliant place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Prior to coming to Warrnambool for a recent family celebration, I booked at the Atwood Motor Inn, and on arrival was greeted very warmly.Our overnight stay was very comfortable, the bed was one of the best I had slept in, the room was lovely and warm as the heater had been turned on for us. It was very clean and the bathroom was big and plenty of good towels etc. The breakfast was delivered right on time and was excellent. The kitchen area is well equipped for a longer stay, and the Motor Inn is situated a short walk from the shops etc and churches.
reviews.title: We will come back again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We would certainly recommend the Atwood Motor Inn and when we require accommodation in Warrnambool in the future we will return to the Atwood.
reviews.title: 100% recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is place is the best value for money. It was spotless, the cleanest place i have ever stayed in, it has all the ammenities you need (finally a place that has decent size coffee cups), coffee making facilities, microwave, fridge and a flat screen TV. We stayed during a cold snap and the heater was a dream. Not only did we get this at the best price, breakfast was included, and it was delicious!!! The couple that own and run the Atwood are also really friendly and go out of there way to make you feel welcome and help you with anything. Dont stay anywhere else!!
reviews.title: A little difficult find, but worth it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a little trouble finding this motel but was quite pleased we had chosen it, as I always choose our hotels/motels from Trip Advisor. The Atwood is on the northern side of National Highway 1 but just a very short drive to the shops/restaurants.
reviews.title: Excellent place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011
reviews.text: Very friendly staff, very clean.
reviews.title: Excellent and value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011
reviews.text: Good central location for both exploring the town and right on the main road for exploring further afield. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Warm & welcoming!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very clean & welcoming! Breakfast was great! Staff very helpful! Location was great in walking distance to CBD!
reviews.title: Excellent small motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owners were so friendly and full of good advice. The hotel is within a short walk of the centre of the town with easy access to shops and restaurants. The rooms are very clean and have been refurbished to a good standard, nice TV, small fridge, comfy bed. The shower was nice, hot n strong and th ecomplimentary breakfast is brought to your room and is a great start to th eday, choice of either cooked breakfast or continental (cereal/toast etc). This is th eonly place I have stayed at in Warrnambool and it is definitely value for money and a great place to stay for an overnighter :)
reviews.title: Still the best Warny Motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: I visit Warrnambool quite a lot and have stayed at a number of motels but Atwood rates as number one in service, friendliness and value for money bar none.. I have no hesitation in recommending this Motel (this is not a paid advetisement and I did not get a commission). If you want a Motel that is quiet, on the fringe of the CBD and staff who actually care about your stay then you won't go wrong booking in.
reviews.title: Great base to explore Warrnambool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Atwood Motor Inn for one night before driving the Great Ocean Road in early January. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The location is a five minute walk to the downtown area with a variety of restaurants to choose from for dinner. The owners/managers could not have been nicer in answering all our questions and making us feel welcome. Would not hesitate to book again.
reviews.title: Great Place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great place to stay in one of the nicest towns I've been to. The bathroom was huge and spoilt it for all the other places we stayed.
reviews.title: Great Value, Great Town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was terrific and we had a great dinner meal at the Whalers Hotel
reviews.title: Lovely clean motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The best value o/nite on our trip.
reviews.title: Fantastic location, very clean room with great breakfast included !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Found this lovely motel through this site. Great clean place to stay and breakfast was fantastic. close to everything and the owners went out of their way to make us feel welcome.
reviews.title: Perfect for our needs

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed at the Atwood Motor Inn for a night after a 1,00km day on the road on a motorbike.
reviews.title: great value, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The location was fantastic, the room bright and comfortable, and the book in easy and friendly. This is really excellent value. Even better - a 5 minute walk away was a liquor store, a noodle house, and an Indian take away!
reviews.title: Just the job!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As I was leaving in the morning and fellow guest was talking to me about my motorbike. When he was leaving he said "you've picked the best motel in town - I come to Warrnambool for work regularly and always stay here".
reviews.title: Best motel stayed in so far in warrnambool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I couldn't agree more. This is a great value Motor Inn and highly recommened. I'll be back.
reviews.title: Central location very friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011
reviews.text: Clean, well priced, comfortable, friendly, centrally positioned, easy parking, easy to find. Perfect for our needs.
reviews.title: Great location with breakfast included for $110.

description: Inner city location and the upper end of 3½ star quality, make the Atwood Motor Inn an ideal choice for visitors looking for quality accommodation at affordable prices. The motel has 21 units ranging from standard double, queen/twin share, spa with 2 person corner spa, family rooms that offer kitchenette facilities (sink, hotplates and crockery) and two bedroom family units comprising queen and separate bedroom with two single beds, and a disabled access unit is available on request. All units have tea coffee making facilities microwaves and toasters. LCD TV and free Austar. High speed internet is available. Atwood Motor Inn also has an outdoor entertaining area with guest barbecue and also has laundry facilities for guests.
